about_the_game:
Online Battle Royale with Thousands of Players Worldwide!


Upgrade your characters, weapons, use supplies, and become the only winner of the HAPPY ZONE!

Surprise Your Enemies

Choose your style with grenades, drones, and even airstrikes! Select characters and unlock new guns to become the strongest on the battlefield! Upgrade your equipment and build up your power!

Grab the Loot

Break boxes, collect loot from defeated enemies, and save valuable resources!

Survive

12 players and only one goal: to become the only survivor on the battlefield!

Assemble a Team

Invite your friends and win together in a special squad mode!

Become a Legend

Climb to the top of the leaderboard, earn unique rewards, and become the star of the HAPPY ZONE! Top players are updated every season!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or SteamOS
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible with 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ALSA or PulseAudio compatible sound card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 (Yosemite) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core M or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: CoreAudio compatible sound card

name: HAPPY ZONE - Battle Royale

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Battle against thousands in HAPPY ZONE! Upgrade characters, unleash drones and airstrikes, collect loot, and outlast 12 players to be the sole survivor. Team up with friends and climb the leaderboard to become a legend!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Finnish*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Vietnamese*
*languages with full audio support
